title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions: Get ready for high-speed superhero action with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This set includes five Batcast Metal diecast vehicles, featuring Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. These cars have working wheels for realistic play and are compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave (sold separately). Perfect for kids aged 3 and older, these toys encourage imaginative play and storytelling. Join the Super Heroes versus Super-Villains racing action with this exciting set!

Introducing the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! Get ready for epic superhero racing action with this set of diecast vehicles. Each pack includes five iconic vehicles like Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz, all in a convenient 1:55 scale size. These Batcast Metal cars are built to last and feature working wheels for added fun.

Compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately and subject to availability), this set is perfect for kids aged 3 years and older. Encouraging imaginative play and storytelling, these vehicles are sure to provide hours of entertainment for any young superhero fan.

Don't miss out on the chance to bring home this action-packed 5-pack of DC Batwheels toy cars. Get yours today and let the superhero racing adventures begin!
